articles.title: FBI to help recover money from SA crypto firm Mirror Trading - News24
articles.description: US investigators joined an investigation into Mirror Trading International, seen as 2020’s biggest cryptocurrency scam, to help liquidators of the South African scheme recover the assets of out-of-pocket investors.
